name: Teeth Whitening
description: Illuminate your smile with professional teeth whitening. Personalized treatments for a brighter, more confident smile that dazzles.

name: Tooth Implantation
description: Restore your smile with precision tooth implants. Tailored solutions for seamless integration, providing natural-looking results and renewed confidence.

name: Orthodontic Braces
description: Transform your smile with customized orthodontic braces. Personalized treatment plans for straighter teeth and enhanced oral health, with unparalleled comfort.

name: Dental Checkup & Cleaning
description: Experience individualized dental care with comprehensive checkups and cleanings. Personal attention to ensure optimal oral health and a radiant smile.
